text: Robert Guy Torricelli (born August 27, 1951), is an American attorney and former politician. He was a member of the U.S. House of Representatives from New Jersey's 9th district from 1983 to 1997 and as a United States senator from New Jersey from 1997 to 2003. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:United States senators from New Jersey Category:United States representatives from New Jersey Category:People from Paterson, New Jersey Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from New Jersey Category:Businesspeople from New Jersey
title: Robert Torricelli
